nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_671
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: You are never too experienced to learn new techniques.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_672
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: There remains one problem, namely, who should be sent to head the research there.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_673
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Their relationship did meet with some difficulty at the beginning because of cultural differences.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_674
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Though he has had ups and downs, I believed all along that he would succeed someday.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_675
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I have some reservations about the truth of your claim.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_676
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: She isn't particularly tall, but her slim figure gives an illusion of height.
